title: How Many Calories Are in 1 Pancake?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 1 pancake, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with easy tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories Are in 1 Pancake?
assumptions: Standard buttermilk pancake, ~4-inch diameter, 1/4 inch thick, made from basic batter (flour, milk, egg, baking powder, butter), pan-fried with minimal oil.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, size, ingredients, cooking method, and brand; toppings or mix-ins change values. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One standard pancake provides ~90 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat flour instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 pancake from mix?
faqs.a: About 90 kcal for a standard homemade or mix-based pancake; varies by brand.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in one pancake?
faqs.a: Roughly 14 g carbs, with 0.5 g fiber and 2 g sugars.
